title: ゆるふわ、たったか、始動します

text_block_list.name: Taiyaki Shop
text_block_list.text: Taiyaki, taiyaki, how about some taiyaki~? Only one left!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: One taiyaki, please!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh! Whoa, sorry! Please, please, please go ahead!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, but, but, but we said it at the same time! ...Oh! That's right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm, warm, fluffy, and very delicious~. Thank you for the treat!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, sharing half makes it taste better somehow! By the way, you're a trainer from the academy, huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This must be some kind of fate. Let's meet again somewhere!
A few days after that happened.

text_block_list.name: Nikuman Shop
text_block_list.text: Nikuman, nikuman, how about some nikuman~? Only one left~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: One nikuman, please!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh!? Whoa, sorry... wait, huh!? It was you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wowow~, things like this happen, huh? ...Should we share half again today? Hehe.
As we kept repeating things like that――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, good morning! Right, right! Take a look at this photo~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu, guess what... I got a brand-new spider plushie! It's just so cute!
We became acquaintances who'd chat whenever we passed each other at the academy. Then one day.
Led by Mihono Bourbon, several Umamusume were doing joint hill training.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: First hill dash completed. Next, starting the second one.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... y-you're going again already!? I can't...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yikes, this is tough~!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Im...possible...! Haaah~...! ...Ugh, I thought I'd built up a fair amount of stamina, though.
The Umamusume are dejected. Amidst this, Matikanetannhauser continues climbing the second uphill path, albeit belatedly.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, fuu, haa!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Third set, add 200m. ...Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-wait for me~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fuu, haa, haaah~... Ahh, I couldn't finish the third set~. Bourbon-san, you're really amazing after all—whoa!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I'm fine, I'm fine! My legs are just a little wobbly. ...I guess I still have a long way to go~.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: No way, you kept up until about the last 300m. That's plenty amazing.
Mihono Bourbon's hard training is top-tier even within the academy. In fact, most Umamusume had given up after the first set—
choice_data_list: (She's not the flashy type, but she has solid ability)

text_block_list.text: A few days after that incident.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa...!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, haven't Rice-san and the others been at it for over two hours? Interval running, right...? They're both incredible.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Keep up, keep up, keep up, up...! Taaah, I've hit my physical limit...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haaah~... No good~! I was pretty confident in my stamina, though.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: No way, that's plenty amazing. Nice fight, Machitan.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, stop it~. Thank you... —Oh! You're the one from the other day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You saw me in a pathetic state, huh~. I wanted to keep up until the end, though. Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, but, I feel like I've grasped some tips for long distances too, yeah. It was good training! Let me jot this down before I forget...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe I should try increasing my stamina a bit more. I also want to practice a form with less air resistance... Hmm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's right, Trainer-san! Um, could I get a little advice, maybe?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: My goal this month is 'I'm going to build up my stamina!', so I want to train a lot of slow-twitch muscles!
Looking at the notebook handed over... it had a fairly hardcore self-training plan, neatly divided by day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Thank you~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, I'm still not skilled enough to compete with the top, and I'm not the type who can do reckless training either.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, I'm doing it with the mindset of taking things step by step from what I can do~. I think if I keep at it, I'll definitely be able to win someday!
Surprisingly positive, hardworking, and with solid fundamentals. Just from watching her a bit over the past few days, her nature was clear enough.
She's definitely not the flashy type. But depending on her future growth, she seems like she could really blossom.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ? Is something wrong?
choice_data_list: Will you make a contract with me?
Will you make a contract with me?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A contract? ...Oh, could it be an offer!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow~! Of course! If it's you, my half-and-half friend, you're welcome-welcome! I look forward to working with you from now on!
And so, the days with Matikanetannhauser—'ordinary' but a little strange—began.
